explicit_uint8.description: Byte represented as hexadecimal unsigned integer

tile_ref.description:
Reference to tiles in the specific file
Syntax: $ref:<path-to-file>[:(tile indexes to use) - optional]
Indexes must be hexadecimal and can be supplied in one of the following forms:
 [index] - single index to use. If used for a range of tiles, scecified tile is repeated
[index]-[index] - range of tiles
[index]: - start of the range of tiles
